definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)

sentences.english: The Compound regular Team Round will not use the set system either.
sentences.chinese: 複合弓的團體比賽也不再將採用局勝制。

sentences.english: They are skilled wielders of the eastern style composite bow.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林弓箭手對東方式複合弓使用嫺熟。

sentences.english: These natural horsemen are armed with a composite bow and wear light armour.
sentences.chinese: 馬扎爾騎兵是天生的弓騎兵，裝備複合弓和輕型鍊甲。

sentences.english: They wear padded or mail armour and are equipped with a composite bow and sword.
sentences.chinese: 拜占庭騎兵身穿鑲甲或鍊甲，裝備複合弓和長劍。
